title: Broad bean and peach salad
ingredients: ['250g frozen broad beans', '170g mangetout, halved', '100g rocket', "45g lamb's lettuce", '4 ripe peaches, stoned and thinly sliced', '450g cottage cheese', '4 tbsp toasted flaked almonds', 'cayenne pepper', 'sprigs of fresh dill to garnish', 'Honey mustard dressing', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lemon', '1 teaspoon wholegrain or Dijon mustard', '2 teaspoons clear honey', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped dill', 'salt and pepper']
